name: DEADLINE (itch) (djseebs)
description:
DEADLINE

Don't you hate it when you have a ton of work to do at the office, but all your co-workers keep turning into zombies??

DEADLINE is a 2D pixel workplace simulator with zombies. Try to survive your workday while avoiding flesh-hungry drones from payroll and ignoring an endless onslaught of memos from your mid-level jerk boss. 

Play for free or download for later! Tips appreciated :)

Controls

Use your arrows keys to move, and Z & X to interact.
